divs: Sighting DetailsStayed virtually motionless in the sky like a star but it was too low. The orange was bright and was hard to make out the red lights on the side. They were very faint. I went inside for a second and when i went back out it was gone and the sky seemed brighter.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bedford
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Hovering orange glow with red light on each side.
